title: State Machine Definition
description: YAML-based state machine definition for Vibe Feature MCP (Simplified Format)

description.description: Description of the state machine's purpose

initial_state.description: The starting state of the machine

bestFor.description: List of use cases this workflow is best suited for

useCases.description: Specific use cases for this workflow

examples.description: Example scenarios where this workflow would be used

requiresDocumentation.description: Whether this workflow requires project documentation (architecture, requirements, design) to be set up before starting. Defaults to false for backwards compatibility.

states.description: Map of states in the state machine

default_instructions.description: Default instructions when entering this state

instructions.description: Instructions to provide when this transition occurs (optional - uses target state default if not provided)

additional_instructions.description: Additional instructions to combine with target state's default instructions (optional)
